comments: My first linguistic course! Professor Cheng and her TA both are awesome and made the class so fun! Quizzes are not hard at all as long as u attend classes regularly.

She was a graduate TA for a professor and the two were pretty inconsistent with lessons. She was a nice lady, but would breeze through slides that she said weren\'t important and that content showed up on quizzes. Overall, pretty nice and a good teacher though.
She LISTENS and she CARES; a good class atmosphere; not treatening or boring at all; you got to let her know your problems and she\'s always willing to help.
Most of the times she\'s clear with what she meant; you just need to ask whenever there\'s a confusion, and she\'s SUPER nice explaining everything and SUPER patient to anyone who asks for help.
Dongmei is a really nice professor. She\'s not very clear on what she wants each essay to consist of, but she\'s more than happy to edit any papers before their due date.
